raw_body: BERHARDT – JOHN MAURICE (Ex Staff of Hatton National Bank PLC),​ dearly beloved husband of late June,​ loving father of Horace,​ Steuart,​ Jerome (All of Australia),​ Sherlock and Veron,​ father-in-law of Romaine and Perin (Australia),​ Tracy and Dilika,​ beloved grandfather of Kirk,​ Amanda,​ Dexter,​ Derrick,​ Joshua,​ Jadyne,​ Natalie,​ Sherwyn,​ Trent,​ Bomal and Delvin. Remains will lie at A.F. Raymond’s Funeral Parlour from 8 a.m. on Wednesday 6th December. Cortege leaves the Parlour on Thursday 7th December at 3 p.m. for Burial at General Cemetery Borella (Roman Catholic Section). Family contact Number : 0772991183.080238
